examples.example: 我提着一篮新鲜的水果去看望生病的朋友。

translate.english: I carried a basket of fresh fruits to visit my sick friend.

examples.example: 我捧着一篮娇艳的鲜花送给亲爱的妈妈。

translate.english: I hold a basket of charming fresh flowers and give them to my dear mother.

examples.example: 我采了一篮美丽的野花送给可爱的妹妹。

translate.english: I picked a basket of beautiful wild flowers and gave them to the lovely sister.
